posts.Title: React JS Best Practices from the New Docs.
posts.Description: The author talks about the new documentation for Reactjs, beta.reactjs.org and discusses 160 facts about ReactJS, such as old news, updates and cool features.
posts.Author: Sebastian Carlos

posts.Title: API development: Part1 - Python/Django
posts.Description: The author takes us through a series of steps in order to create an API with Django. Also, the author gives notes to explain concepts and terminologies used in Django.
posts.Author: Rishi Mishra
